topic.title: NullPaste - Decentralized pastebin with code highlighting&encryption

1_16Szsy1UtjiXpEevWVdUDrNfNTAZ9PLbcY.body: Thanks for reporting! It should be fixed now.
Now it shows Delete button for your own pastes. Also became cloneable.

Implemented paste encryption! Encrypted pastes are not listed in the recent pastes list, but automatically decrypted with your private key when you visit the paste page.

Sample:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?16Szsy1UtjiXpEevWVdUDrNfNTAZ9PLbcY_24
Can't read it?

And added an new page, which cointains some basic numbers about this pastebin.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?about

Added "My pastes" page. All of your pastes including private ones will be listed.

For example, here are my pastes:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?user_nullpo@zeroid.bit
